pages.text: $(li)The Swampjaw is an ancient predator that was located in the swamps, but now, it is just a fossil that can be summoned with the $(l:patchouli:bosses/rumor_swampjaw)Fosil Bait$(/l).$(br)$(li)This creature will be floating around you throwing powerful bombs at you or heading towards you to physically attack you.

pages.name: Swampjaw
pages.text: It drops $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bone)Bones$(/l), Dirt blocks, Vines and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/meet_your_fight/mossy_tooth)Mossy Tooths$(/l) upon death.
